mapper.select: SELECT student.*,major.major_name,dept.dept_name FROM student LEFT JOIN major on student.stu_major=major.major_id LEFT JOIN dept on student.stu_dept=dept.dept_id WHERE stu_id=#{stu_id}

SELECT student.stu_id,student.stu_name,major.major_name,dept.dept_name,course_select.score,course_select.course_id,course.course_name FROM student LEFT JOIN major on student.stu_major=major.major_id LEFT JOIN dept on student.stu_dept=dept.dept_id LEFT JOIN course_select on student.stu_id=course_select.stu_id LEFT JOIN course on course.course_id=course_select.course_id WHERE course_select.course_id=#{course_id}
SELECT student.*,major.major_name,dept.dept_name FROM student LEFT JOIN major on student.stu_major=major.major_id LEFT JOIN dept on student.stu_dept=dept.dept_id
